name: Digging Blocks
description: Will give you more blocks to build with

name: Get More Ammo
description: By picking up the blue floating object after a player dies

name: Capture Canisters Faster
description: By having multiple teammates in the capture zone

name: Spire
description: Build up to a floating green weapon and press C to grab it

sections.win: Win a round by eliminating the other team. First to win 5 rounds wins the match.

name: Static
description: All players start with a randomized loadout. Eliminate the other team with what you've got

sections.win: Win a round by eliminating the other team. First to win 5 rounds wins the match.
